snippet: Harry Burkhart looked disoriented and entered no plea in his first court appearance.
abstract: Harry Burkhart, 24-year-old German who was born in Chechnya, is charged with 37 counts of arson related to a series of fires that terrorized the Hollywood and West Hollywood areas of Los Angeles; California; prosecutors believe Burkhart was inspired by a hatred of America.
lead_paragraph: Harry Burkhart looked disoriented and entered no plea in his first court appearance.

headline.seo: Arson Suspect Harry Burkhart Charged in Los Angeles
headline.main: Los Angeles Arson Suspect Is Charged With 37 Counts
headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Arson Suspect Is Charged With 37 Counts
